newsitem.title: USA: Avalon Community opens center in Colorado.
newsitem.headline: Avalon Community opens center in Colorado.

text.p: Avalon Community Services Inc said Monday it opened the Diamond Crest Assisted Living Center, a new assisted living center for the elderly in Fort Collins, Colo.
Construction was completed last week on phase one of the center with accomodations for 40 residents, it said. A second phase to expand Diamond Crest to 64 beds is scheduled to be completed in 1997.
